name: UnivisionNoticias
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Recap of the news you should know everyday to stay informed. Listening to the this recap you will know all the most relevant news that has happened and important items of the day. The content is for Spanish speaking users that also speak fluent English and understands both languages easily.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
